title: DEADLY DECEIT
description:
When you care for someone, you do your best to be faithful and loyal. But when that someone is deceitful, and betrays your confidence, it will do more than shake you. It will make you question everything you know about them. That is if you're still alive, because when someone stabs you in the back, you might not survive their deadly deceit.

First, friends aren’t always forever 
Followed by, comfort in evil
Then, the devil lurks right below you
Finally in our featured story, a midnight massacre

Find your inner detective. Download June’s Journey free today on the Apple App Store or Google Play
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
